patthana9.6:4.1: Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana9.6:4.2: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana9.6:4.6: nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana9.6:4.7: vicikicchāsahagataṃ uddhaccasahagataṃ mohaṃ paṭicca sampayuttakā khandhā;
patthana9.6:4.9: Nasahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana9.6:5.1: Naahetukaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.6:6.1: Nasahetukaṃ nakusalañca naahetukaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.6:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana9.6:8.1: Nasahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.6:9.1: Naahetukaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.6:10.1: Nasahetukaṃ naakusalañca naahetukaṃ naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.6:11.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane dve … pe … avigate nava.
patthana9.6:12.1: Nasahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana9.6:13.1: Naahetukaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana9.6:14.1: Nasahetukaṃ naabyākatañca naahetukaṃ naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana9.6:15.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
